html.p:
Client filtering can be performed using fields from sourcetype:actions or sourcetype:clients.
For example:
host=sys*
group=Win7
host=* os=Win*
host=* bigfix_server=bescore

table.title: Overview
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients | search $filter$ | dedup host, bigfix_server | table host, client_id, src_ip, dns_name, user_name, os, ad_path, bigfix_server, _time

chart.title: Reports Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients | search $filter$ | timechart count by host

table.title: Open Actions
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=actions NOT stopper=* NOT time_stopped=* | dedup action_id, host, bigfix_server | join host, client_id, bigfix_server [search savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients] | convert timeformat="%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S" mktime(start_time) as start mktime(end_time) as end | eval is_active=if(start <= now(), if(end > now(), "True", "False"), if(isnull(end_time), "True", "False")) | search is_active=True $filter$ | top action_id, action_name, status, reapply, restart_required, bigfix_server limit=0 showperc=f | sort -count, action_name
